message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to counteroffer at $95.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
It seems like we're stuck at $100, Bob. I'm willing to take a slightly firmer stance. I'll sell the product to you for $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I see your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
I've already offered you $110 and you've stuck at $100. I'm not willing to go any lower than $108. This is my final offer.
Considering your last offer, Alice, I believe $100 remains a fair price. Let's aim for a compromise at $105.
